name: Felix

background.notes: Felix is a young Tzelicrae whose spider-like features are more pronounced than most of their kin. Born on a reef-spit settlement, they learned to fight dirty and think fast when pirates raided their home. Now they've embraced the corsair life, using their natural climbing abilities and web-spinning to board enemy vessels. Their eight eyes give them excellent peripheral vision, and they're known for their acrobatic fighting style that makes full use of the ship's rigging.

drives:
Lead a successful boarding action
Outmaneuver a superior enemy through cunning
Protect those weaker than yourself from bullies

mires.label: You're too quick to resort to violence
You have trouble trusting authority figures

aspects.name: Web Spinner (Traits) - Tzelicrae
aspects.details: You can produce strong silk webbing from your spinnerets. Mark to create rope, nets, or temporary structures.

aspects.name: Wall Walker (Traits) - Tzelicrae
aspects.details: Your spider heritage allows you to climb any surface with ease. You can walk on walls and ceilings as if they were floors.

aspects.name: Corsair's Cunning (Traits) - Corsair
aspects.details: Your experience in naval combat serves you well. Gain advantage when fighting on ships or in rigging.

aspects.name: Reef Fighter (Traits) - Spit
aspects.details: Growing up on a dangerous spit taught you to fight for survival. You deal extra damage when fighting multiple opponents.

aspects.name: Boarding Axe (Gear) - Corsair
aspects.details: A weapon designed for ship-to-ship combat. Deals CQ Keen damage and can cut through rigging and light armor.

aspects.name: Grappling Hook (Gear) - Corsair
aspects.details: Essential tool for boarding actions. Mark to swing between ships or climb seemingly impossible surfaces.

aspects.name: Totally Normal Sword
aspects.details: Roll flourish to deal CQ damage (no need to mark). Roll flourish to absorb damage from another sword.

aspects.name: Totally Normal Flintlock
aspects.details: Mark and roll flourish to deal LR damage. Reload: spend an action to unmark.

minorMilestones.label: Swung from ship to ship in combat

notesV2.value:
Has a habit of hanging upside down when thinking deeply.

Makes their own silk rope, which is stronger than hemp.

Collects small trinkets from defeated enemies as trophies.
